title: Where can I study medicine in English? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nearly all European countries offer English faculties of medicine. It will just cost more than it usually costs. Tuition fee ranges from $12,000–$35,000. It’s more cost-effective to find english faculty in your country, as for citizens, every country has great reductions. Although the program might not be as good as in other international medical schools, you can subscribe to online medical teaching programs like lecturio. These kinds of programs cost up to 300$, so you’ll economize a lot. Lecturio for example offers its own curriculum, so you can prepare for boards exam directly from their platform.
